Percentage of urban/built-up areas summed with cultivated/managed vegetation (summed via composite code)
The global Human Modification dataset (gHM) provides a cumulative measure of human modification of terrestrial lands globally at 1 square-kilometer resolution.
Mean between-year seasonality represented as the mean of the 2000-2014 monthly standard deviations;
Within-year seasonality represented as the standard deviation of mean 2000-2014 monthly cloud frequencies;
Mean annual cloud frequency (%) over 2000-2014;
Seasonal cloud concentration index (see methods for full description) ranging from 0 (all months equally cloudy) to 100 (all clouds are observed in a single month);

Timing of peak seasonal cloud concentration (see methods for full description) expressed as an angle (degrees) ranging from 0 (peak cloudiness observed on January 1st) to 360 (peak cloudiness observed on December 31st).
